cause.description:
The purpose of this cause is to educate others about the existence and the negative effects of hate crimes such as violence, psychological damage, and even death. We need to stop these violations of human rights. No one should have to live in fear. It is our job to make the world a better place.
1. Hate crimes must be prevented.
2. Human rights must not be violated.
3. Everyone has equal human rights.
4. Safety is a universal right.
5. No one should have to live in fear.
cause.mission: Our mission is to educate others about the existence of hate crimes and to discuss ways of preventing them.
cause.name: Awareness And Prevention Of Hate Crimes
